_comment: Example CDK context configuration for multi-region Pi-hole deployment
_usage: Copy this file to cdk.context.json and customize for your environment
_comment_single_region: For single region deployment, specify vpc_name and keypair directly
_comment_multi_region: For multi-region deployment, uncomment and configure the following

ap-southeast-2._comment: Sydney uses Graviton by default, use_intel not needed

ap-southeast-4._comment: Melbourne requires Intel instances (Graviton not available)

eu-central-1._comment: Frankfurt uses Graviton by default for cost optimization
